app.title: Exoplanet AI
app.subtitle: AI-Powered Exoplanet Discovery Platform
app.description: Advanced machine learning algorithms for detecting exoplanets in photometric data from space missions like TESS, Kepler, and K2.

footer.powered: Powered by Advanced AI and Modern Astronomy
footer.description: Democratizing access to exoplanet discovery through artificial intelligence and open science.

bls.title: BLS Analysis
bls.description: Advanced Box Least Squares algorithm for fast and accurate detection of periodic transit signals in photometric data.

gpi.title: GPI Method
gpi.description: Generalized Periodogram with AI enhancement for detecting small planets and improving signal-to-noise ratio.

database.title: Smart Database
database.description: Comprehensive database with real NASA data, analytics, and search history for enhanced discovery workflows.

about.title: About Exoplanet AI
about.missionText: Our mission is to democratize access to modern exoplanet discovery methods and accelerate scientific discoveries in astronomy.
about.missionDescription: Democratize access to modern exoplanet discovery methods and accelerate scientific discoveries in astronomy. We strive to make light curve analysis accessible to researchers of all levels â€” from students to professional astronomers.
about.dataLoadingDesc: The system automatically downloads light curves from MAST archives for the specified target and performs data preprocessing.
about.blsAnalysisDesc: The Box Least Squares algorithm searches for periodic transit signals, evaluating various combinations of period, epoch, and duration.
about.aiValidationDesc: An ensemble of neural networks analyzes the found signals and filters out false positives, providing confidence estimates.
about.aiSystemDesc: Automatic light curve analysis using modern machine learning algorithms
about.blsAlgorithmDesc: Fast and accurate search for periodic transit signals in photometric data
about.databaseDesc: Accumulation and structuring of results to improve analysis quality
about.resourcesDesc: Explore documentation, usage examples, and scientific publications for a deeper understanding of the system's methods and algorithms.

aiTraining.title: AI Training
aiTraining.subtitle: Train neural networks for exoplanet detection

catalog.title: Exoplanet Catalog
catalog.subtitle: Explore discovered exoplanets and their properties

gpi.title: Gravitational Phase Interferometry
gpi.subtitle: Advanced exoplanet detection using gravitational phase shifts
gpi.syntheticGenerated: Synthetic GPI data generated! You can now run analysis on synthetic target.

search.title: Unified Exoplanet Search
search.subtitle: Switchable search: BLS, Ensemble or Hybrid mode

ensemble.name: Ultimate Ensemble
features: 6 methods in parallel (BLS, GPI, TLS, Wavelet, Fourier, ML)

hybrid.name: Hybrid Search
hybrid.description: Smart combination of BLS and Ensemble with auto-selection
features: Parallel execution of BLS and Ensemble

notFound.subtitle: The page you're looking for doesn't exist.
